post.body: don't tweet about killing people. that's not acceptable. food tweets & a lot of them are totally O-TAY!
food tweets are totally okay... murder tweets are not acceptable, however...
my kaiju is .5 MAN & .5 AMAZING... that evening he'll just be amazing. lol
the above or below listed message is for you. thank you. come again.
did i hear you say pot pie???
nope all is well in the tweethood!
thank you sis... and stalking is totally permisable (sp?) in this instance... STALK UNTIL YOUR HEART'S CONTENT!
thank you sis... love you!
make sure you look though... lmao
- LOOK, IT'S INDIA ARIE & BIG DEEBO! lol. i left the name out for anonymity (sp?)
a good place to start is to determine if you like WHITE or RED... once that is done, then have a wine sampling PARTY! *wink*
oh yes... i'll host the wine sampling portion & you host the pot pie portion!!! limited invites. no more than 3.5 people... lol *dead*
i turned to COPS.. i can't decide... COPS is my favorite. it's sad, but it's so EXCITING!
is watching "HAPPY NEW YEAR CHARLIE BROWN"... now THIS is what a good Saturday is all about to me. and i'm NOT being facetious! :o)
don't make me blushy and stuff... @tishushu
at the link @tishushu!
take a look, it's in a book. a reading rainbow.. it's not a reading rainbow, but take a look! http://tinyurl.com/a93lhk
hates when people always make their problems seem more important than yours.. lol. give me a break dude...
is getting back into the bed... sheesh.
i don't have a week. heck, today is the last day i have! @tishushu
